name: BrewSpirit
description: BrewSpirit is a Metroidvania-style game steeped in action and adventure within the beer brewing universe. Players assume the role of Lou, a master brewer, who explores the world of beer making to acquire brewing knowledge and uncover a secret beer recipe. Along the way, he’s tasked with helping new friends defeat beer enemies like the O2 Brothers and Bad Bar Manager Greta to save and preserve high-quality beer and please the Beer Lords.
